sentences.en: Advance managing mode and professional technicians make the enterprise the apotheosis in the industry.
sentences.cn: 先进的管理模式,专业的技术人员使企业成为行业典范.

sentences.en: He consulted his dictionary to look up the meaning of the word apotheosis.
sentences.cn: 他在字典中查看这个单词的词义.

sentences.en: He was an apotheosis of chivalry.
He was the apotheosis of generosity.
sentences.cn: 他是宽宏大量的化身[典范].

sentences.en: He was the apotheosis of integrity.

sentences.cn: 乔丹是所有运动员的完美典范.

sentences.en: It centers on the biography about three apotheosis of humanism, who are Beethoven, Michelangelo and Tolstoy.
sentences.cn: 论述罗曼·罗兰为自己喜爱的三位人道主义精神典范所作的传记, 他们是贝多芬 、 米开朗基罗和托尔斯泰.

sentences.en: That thinking it a apotheosis as benignancy of Tang's annihilating Xia, was purely the Confucian fudge.
sentences.cn: 后世以汤伐葛为行仁义之师的典范, 纯是儒家之造作.

sentences.en: the apotheosis of a Roman Emperor
The Oriental in Bangkok is the apotheosis of the grand hotel.
sentences.cn: 曼谷的东方酒店是大饭店的典范。

sentences.en: Their leader was the apotheosis of courage.
sentences.cn: 他们的领导人是勇敢的典范.

words.tran_cn: 神化；崇拜，颂扬；尊奉为神

trans.tran_cn: 尊为神圣，神化，美化，颂扬
trans.tran_en: If something is the apotheosis of something else, it is an ideal or typical example of it
